8.title: AI Advertising Campaign
8.description: Spot created with artificial intelligence for the Creative School advertising campaign. The video uses image generation and advanced editing to convey the value of educational innovation.

1.title: Experimental Visual Poetry
1.description: Experimental audiovisual piece that fuses light, image and movement. This video-poem explores visual language through kinetic typography, organic textures and visual metaphors, creating a sensory narrative that transcends the literal. A personal work that reflects my interest in hybrid forms of contemporary audiovisual expression.

2.title: Fashion Film
2.description: Cinematographic short film focused on fashion. Direction, cinematography and complete editing, exploring visual narrative through contemporary style and aesthetics.

3.title: Short Film Edited Without Script
3.description: Narrative editing exercise working with existing material without a prior script. Challenge of building a coherent and emotional story through editing and shot selection.

4.title: Short Film Recording and Editing
4.description: Editing and camera work done outdoors for a fiction short film. I participated during filming on real location, handling both image capture and post-editing in a professional environment. The video shown only includes some selected fragments of the complete short for copyright and duration reasons.

5.title: Codebreak - Multiplayer Game
5.description: Real-time multiplayer logic game where players must crack secret codes.

6.title: Resolume Screens for betevé
6.description: Comprehensive design of dynamic visuals for betevé's Resolume system, used live to announce special guests and concerts. It was my own creative proposal, exploring new visual trends (trending styles) and innovation in the audiovisual flow of the set for live television. I mixed animated typography, trending colors and adaptive layouts to give the program a fresh and unique look.

7.title: Animated Logo with AE
7.description: Logo animation created in After Effects using motion design principles. The project explores smooth transitions and modern visual effects to bring brand identity to life.
